alert.note: Alert for Portage (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Portage County through 600 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stevens Point, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain are possible with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amherst, Polonia, Jordon, Stockton, Custer and Nelson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
